page.title: 18A DAY AT ST. PETER'S SCHOOL
page.content: Then we have another break when you are given a drink and biscuit. The break ends at 4.45p.m. We then have a period of 40 minutes when on Monday and Friday we do certain activities whilst on Tuesday and Thursday we do sports e.g Badminton and athletics etc. until 5.25 p.m when the daypupils go home. Boarders have tea at 5.30 p.m, and at6.00p.m they start prep which can last until 7.45p.m. Then at 8.30p.m we have a bath and at 8.50p.m we go to bed . At 9.05p.m lights are turned out. We play many sports including rugby, football, and cricket, and matches against other schools are played reguarly.All these are played during school hours.That's how a day at our school normally goes.
